alert.note: Alert for Camden; Miller; Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 9:44PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Miller, north central Camden and Morgan Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 943 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Laurie, or 10 miles south of Versailles, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake of The Ozarks, Lake of The Ozarks State Park, Eldon, Osage Beach, Versailles, Village of Four Seasons, Lake Ozark, Stover, Laurie, Sunrise Beach, Barnett, Gravois Mills, Olean, Bagnell, Lakeside, Rocky Mount, Etterville, Lakeview, Purvis and Aurora Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central Missouri.
